body:
Harry Styles - Shave

“Hold still.” I whispered as I lathered the shaving foam in my palm. Harry simply winked at me, sliding his hands up my bare thighs.

He’d woken me up this morning with scratchy kisses, and given he’s got a big interview with a new record label I suggested that he shave off the stubble on his jaw. After much complaining and whining, I finally agreed to do it for him. So now here I am, sat on the countertop next to the sink, Harry standing between my open thighs as I spread the white foam over the bottom half of his face.

“Don’t shave my eyesbrows.” He hummed.

“No? Thought you’d look handsome like that.” I giggled back, grabbing a towel and wiping my hands clean. “You sure you want me to shave you? I don’t wanna cut you.”

He rolled his eyes. “Don’t worry, if you cut me I’ll give you a ten second head start.”

I rolled my eyes at him. “Such a gentleman.”

“You know me.” He chuckled. I grabbed the razor and warily looked at him. “You won’t cut me baby, I trust you.” He sweetly said. I smiled and set to work.

I started with his neck, gliding the blade over the shorter hairs first before leaning over and swirling the razor in the sink. The water turned a creamy white with flecks of hair resting on the surface.

“So good, so far.” I murmured to myself as I lifted his chin to make sure I’d rid the hair on his neck completely. Once done I moved to his left cheek, starting at his sharp jaw line before dragging upwards to just under his side burn. His eyes never left my face, clearly amused by the amount of concentration I was putting in thus far.

After his cheeks were smooth and tipped his forehead back so the skin on his chin stretched out more. I was careful not to cut his plump bottom lip, dragging the blade extra slowly to ensure a smooth finish. I tapped his upper lip, which he tucked into his teeth and I shaved over the small moustache he had grown. I pulled back and let the razor sink into the water, making sure I hadn’t missed a spot.

“Handsome.” I smiled. I grabbed the towel and swiped off the excess foam speckled on his face. I grabbed the small bottle of moisturiser, squirting a dollop onto my hand before rubbing it into his skin.

He hummed at the contact. “Look good?” I nodded. “I’ll shave yours now.”

I gasped and gently tapped the skin of his cheek. “I resent that.”

“But not me?” His eyes sparkled with humour.

I shook my head. “Never you.” I pecked his lips, however soon Harry picked me up, promising to take me in the bed as I giggled in his ear.

summary: older!harry wanting to be the one who shows you the world and the one who makes all your wishes come true ,not hesitating to...
question: older!harry wanting to be the one who shows you the world and the one who makes all your wishes come true ,not hesitating to spend money and alot of it to see you smile, because he believes that what is his , is yours. He wants to offer you the best life you can have because he wants to share it all with you and to give you all of his boundless, boundless love ,to watch over you ,to keep everything horrible away and to make you feel that if ever you wanted anything done he lived to do it.

masterlist

summary: Hey! I feel really sad, alone and just lonely, could you write a little blurb about Harry comforting Y/N on a day like this,...
question: Hey! I feel really sad, alone and just lonely, could you write a little blurb about Harry comforting Y/N on a day like this, pretty please? Thank you so much in advance, hun. Love you and your blog.x
answer:
“hey, hey — m’here. you’re not alone.”

harry frowns and pouts upon seeing you already face down on the bed almost motionless, knowing what you were already feeling without even askin and he feels for you.

just feels empathetic for you and god does he want to take the feeling of that emptiness and heaviness from you, already dipping in to the spot beside you before having his hands roam on your knuckles.

plays with your hands at the moment, hoping that his thumbs tracing every outline of your knuckles to the pads of your fingers could momentarily distract you, humming as he nuzzles you close to him.

“never gonna be, lovie.”

summary: Say Harry's gone in to work, sick as a dog because he has a crush on his assistant. He's getting papers together for a meeting,...
question: Say Harry's gone in to work, sick as a dog because he has a crush on his assistant. He's getting papers together for a meeting, but he's getting really nauseous. His assistant comes in to try and discuss the meeting and notes he forgot to get from her. His face pales and he runs to the restroom to be sick; he is surprised when she follows him and does not leave when he is kneeling by a toilet, choosing to stay and help calm him down. They leave the restroom and someone he works with gets angry
answer:
at him because the meeting has already started and he is late. Harry is upset and trying to compose himself and get to his office for the papers he needs. His assistant gets pissed off and starts arguing with the coworker, because Harry is sick and she is bringing him home–so why doesn’t the guy go so some work and stop being a little bitch talking out of his ass? Thoughts?

+

thoughts: i’m on the floor
